name: Nervous Days - The Game
description:
Nervous days  is a homemade video game where you run after likes and followers, trying to survive in the social media jungle ! 
Created by Yvan Megal & Strapontin for the release of ‘The End of Logic’ Album.

Let us know what you think of it !!
Any feedbacks appreciated :)

Like the music ?
https://strapontin.bandcamp.com/
https://hardfist.bandcamp.com/album/strapontin-the-end-of-logic-hrd010
